author: celtic.warrior
content: With 15% of the network's validators, I would suggest that SSV has the power, and perhaps the responsibility, to ensure better reporting of the different EL/CL mixes that its operators use. (Note: I'm an SSV operator with a diverse set of ELs & CLs.).

author: prestonvanloon
content:
gm folks - Here's the Prysm postmortem from the incident on December 4th. https://prysm.offchainlabs.com/docs/misc/mainnet-postmortems/#fusaka-mainnet-prysm-incident

All feedback welcome. I hope it's valuable. Thanks!
